amendment.description: Amendment, as modified, adds the Administrator of U.S. Small Business Administration or a designated representative to the Wildlife and Hunting Heritage Conservation Council Advisory Committees membership.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 4 printed in House Report 114-429 to add the Administrator of U.S. Small Business Administration or a designated representative to the Wildlife and Hunting Heritage Conservation Council Advisory Committees membership.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Costa amendment (A004) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Costa amendment (A004) modified by unanimous consent.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Costa amendment (A004) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Costa.
